Pinyin1: cóngqián yǒu yīzhī zhū māma
Chinese1: 从前有一只猪妈妈
Translate1: Once upon a time there was a mother pig

Pinyin1: shēng le sānzhǐ xiǎozhū
Chinese1: 生了三只小猪
Translate1: Give birth to three little piglets

Pinyin1: zhū māma yǎngbùhuó tāmen sān xiōngdì
Chinese1: 猪妈妈养不活他们三兄弟
Translate1: Pig mother can not support their three brothers

Pinyin1: yúshì ， jiù bǎ tāmen dǎfā chūqù
Chinese1: 于是，就把他们打发出去
Translate1: So, send them out

Pinyin1: ràng tāmen gèzì qù xúnzhǎo zìjǐ de xìngfú
Chinese1: 让他们各自去寻找自己的幸福
Translate1: Let them look for their own happiness

Pinyin1: dìyī zhǐ xiǎozhū
Chinese1: 第一只小猪
Translate1: The first little pig

Pinyin1: pèngdào yīgè bào zhe yīkǔn dàocǎo de rén
Chinese1: 碰到一个抱着一捆稻草的人
Translate1: Meet a person holding a bundle of straw

Pinyin1: biàn duì zhe nàgè rén shuō
Chinese1: 便对着那个人说
Translate1: said to that person

Pinyin1: “ qīnài de rén ， qǐng bǎ nǐ de dàocǎo gěi wǒ
Chinese1: “亲爱的人，请把你的稻草给我
Translate1: Dear person, please give me your straw

Pinyin1: wǒ xiǎng yòng tā lái gài yīsuǒ fáng ”
Chinese1: 我想用它来盖一所房”
Translate1: I want to use it to build a house

Pinyin1: yúshì ， nàgè rén jiù bǎ dàocǎo gěi le xiǎozhū
Chinese1: 于是，那个人就把稻草给了小猪
Translate1: So that person gave the straw to the piglet

Pinyin1: xiǎozhū yòng dàocǎo gài le yīsuǒ fángzi
Chinese1: 小猪用稻草盖了一所房子
Translate1: Piggy covered a house with straw

Pinyin1: láng cóng dìyī zhǐ xiǎozhū de fángzi qián lùguò
Chinese1: 狼从第一只小猪的房子前路过
Translate1: Wolf passed by the first little pig's house

Pinyin1: láng qiāoqiāo mén shuō
Chinese1: 狼敲敲门说
Translate1: The wolf knocked the door and said

Pinyin1: “ xiǎozhū ， xiǎozhū ， ràng wǒ jìnqù ”
Chinese1: “小猪，小猪，让我进去”
Translate1: Pig, Pig, let me go in

Pinyin1: xiǎozhū huídá shuōdao
Chinese1: 小猪回答说道
Translate1: Little pig replied

Pinyin1: “ bù ， bù ， wǒ bùnéng ràng nǐ jìnlái ”
Chinese1: “不，不，我不能让你进来”
Translate1: No, no, I can't let you come in

Pinyin1: láng shuō ： “ nà wǒ jiù bǎ nǐ de fángzi chuīdǎo ”
Chinese1: 狼说：“那我就把你的房子吹倒”
Translate1: The wolf said: "Then I will destroy your house

Pinyin1: yúshì ， láng jiù chuī ya chuī ya
Chinese1: 于是，狼就吹呀吹呀
Translate1: So, the wolf blows and blows it

Pinyin1: láng chuīdǎo le fángzi ， ránhòu jiù bǎ xiǎozhū chī le
Chinese1: 狼吹倒了房子，然后就把小猪吃了
Translate1: The wolf destroys the house and eats the pig

Pinyin1: dìèrzhǐ xiǎozhū
Chinese1: 第二只小猪
Translate1: The second little pig

Pinyin1: tā zài lùshang pèngdào yīgè bào zhe yīduī mùtou de rén
Chinese1: 它在路上碰到一个抱着一堆木头的人
Translate1: It encountered a man holding a bunch of wood on the road

Pinyin1: xiǎozhū duì zhe nàgè rén shuō
Chinese1: 小猪对着那个人说
Translate1: The piglet said to that person

Pinyin1: “ qīnài de rén ， qǐng bǎ nǐ de mùtou gěi wǒ
Chinese1: “亲爱的人，请把你的木头给我
Translate1: Dear person, please give me your wood

Pinyin1: wǒ xiǎng yòng tāmen láigài yīsuǒ fángzi ”
Chinese1: 我想用它们来盖一所房子”
Translate1: I want to use them to build a house

Pinyin1: yúshì ， nàgè rén jiù bǎ mùtou gěi le xiǎozhū
Chinese1: 于是，那个人就把木头给了小猪
Translate1: So that person gave the wood to the piglet

Pinyin1: ránhòu xiǎozhū yòng tāmen gài le yīsuǒ fángzi
Chinese1: 然后小猪用它们盖了一所房子
Translate1: Then the piglets used them to build a house

Chinese1: 有一天，狼从小猪门前路过
Translate1: One day, the wolf passed by the pig's door

Pinyin1: láng shuōdao ： “ xiǎozhū ， xiǎozhū ， ràng wǒ jìnqù ！ ”
Chinese1: 狼说道：“小猪，小猪，让我进去！”
Translate1: The wolf said, "Pig, Pig, let me go in!

Pinyin1: xiǎozhū huídá dào ： “ bù ， bù ， wǒ bùràng nǐ jìnlái ”
Chinese1: 小猪回答道：“不，不，我不让你进来”
Translate1: The pig replied, "No, no, I won't let you come in

Pinyin1: láng shuō ： “ nà wǒ jiù bǎ nǐ de fángzi cuīhuǐ le ”

Translate1: The wolf said, "Then I destroyed your house

Chinese1: 于是，狼就使劲撞房子
Translate1: So the wolf hit the house hard

Pinyin1: zuìhòu bǎ fángzi cuīhuǐ le

Translate1: Finally destroyed the house

Pinyin1: láng bǎ dìèrzhǐ xiǎozhū yě chī le
Chinese1: 狼把第二只小猪也吃了
Translate1: The wolf ate the second pig

Pinyin1: dìsānzhī xiǎozhū
Chinese1: 第三只小猪
Translate1: Third little pig

Pinyin1: yúshì ， nàgè rén bǎ zhuān gěi le xiǎozhū

Chinese1: 这一天，狼来了

Translate1: The wolf said to the piglet

Pinyin1: “ xiǎozhū ， xiǎozhū ， ràng wǒ jìnqù ”

Translate1: Pig, Pig, let me go in

Pinyin1: xiǎozhū huídá shuō ： “ bù ， bù ， wǒ bùràng nǐ jìnlái ”

Translate1: The pig replied, "No, no, I won't let you come in

Pinyin1: láng shuōdao ： “ nà wǒ jiù bǎ nǐ de fángzi huǐdiào ”

Pinyin1: láng fāxiàn cuīhuǐ buliǎo fángzi

Translate1: The wolf found that the house could not be destroyed

Pinyin1: yúshì ， láng duì zhe xiǎozhū shuōdao

Translate1: So the wolf said to the piglet

Chinese1: “小猪，小猪，我知道一块很漂亮的萝卜地”

Pinyin1: xiǎozhū wèndào ： “ zài nǎlǐ ？ ”
Chinese1: 小猪问道：“在哪里？”
Translate1: Little pig asked: "Where is it?

Pinyin1: láng huídá dào ： “ zài mílè xiānsheng de fángzi hòubian ，
Chinese1: 狼回答道：“在弥勒先生的房子后边，
Translate1: The wolf replied: "Behind Mr. Maitreya's house,

Pinyin1: rúguǒ nǐ míngtiān zǎoshang yě xiǎng qù
Chinese1: 如果你明天早上也想去
Translate1: If you want to go tomorrow morning

Pinyin1: wǒlái jiē nǐ ， wǒmen yīqǐ qù
Chinese1: 我来接你，我们一起去
Translate1: I'm here to pick you up, let's go together

Pinyin1: báxiē luóbo dāng wǔfàn chī ”
Chinese1: 拔些萝卜当午饭吃”
Translate1: Dap some radish lunch

Pinyin1: xiǎozhū shuōdao ： “ hǎo bā ， wǒ gēn nǐ qù ， shénme shíhou chūfā ”

Translate1: The pig said, "Okay, when will I go with you, when will you set off?

Pinyin1: láng huídá dào ： “ liùdiǎnzhōng ”

Translate1: The wolf replied: "Six o'clock

Pinyin1: dìèrtiān zǎoshang ， xiǎozhū wǔdiǎnzhōng jiù qǐchuáng le

Translate1: The next morning, the little pig got up at five o'clock

Pinyin1: láng shuōdao ： “ xiǎozhū ， nǐ zhǔnbèi hǎolema ？ ”

Translate1: The wolf said, "Pig, are you ready?

Translate1: The piglet replied: "I have been there

Pinyin1: yě qǔhuí le mànmàn yīkuāng luóbo dāng wǔfàn ”
Chinese1: 也取回了慢慢一筐萝卜当午饭”
Translate1: Also retrieved a basket of radish lunch

Pinyin1: láng tīng le hěn shēngqì
Chinese1: 狼听了很生气

Pinyin1: dànshì láng juéde zìjǐ háishi néng piànguò xiǎozhū

Translate1: But the wolf thinks he can still lie to the piglet

Chinese1: 狼又对小猪说道：“小猪，我知道一颗很美丽的苹果树”

Pinyin1: xiǎozhū wèndào ： “ zài nǎr ”
Chinese1: 小猪问道：“在哪儿”
Translate1: Little pig asked: "Where is it?

Pinyin1: láng huídá dào ： “ zài xiàmiàn de nóngfū de fángzi pángbiān ”

Translate1: The wolf replied: "Next to the farmer's house

Pinyin1: xiǎozhū shuō ： “ rúguǒ nǐ bùxiǎng piàn wǒ
Chinese1: 小猪说：“如果你不想骗我
Translate1: The piglet said, "If you don't want to lie to me

Pinyin1: wǒ míngtiān zǎoshang wǔdiǎnzhōng qù gěi nǐ zhāi jǐge píngguǒ lái ”
Chinese1: 我明天早上五点钟去给你摘几个苹果来”
Translate1: I will pick you up a few apples for you tomorrow in five o'clock in the morning

Pinyin1: dìèrtiān zǎoshang ， xiǎozhū sìdiǎn qǐchuáng qù zhāi píngguǒ
Chinese1: 第二天早上，小猪四点起床去摘苹果
Translate1: The next morning, the piglet got up at four o'clock to pick the apple

Pinyin1: xiǎozhū dǎsuàn zài láng lái zhīqián fǎnhuí jiā
Chinese1: 小猪打算在狼来之前返回家
Translate1: Piggy is going to return home before the wolf comes

Pinyin1: dànshì ， zhè yīcì de lùchéng bǐjiào yuǎn
Chinese1: 但是，这一次的路程比较远
Translate1: However, this time the journey is relatively long

Pinyin1: xiǎozhū huán xūyào páshù
Chinese1: 小猪还需要爬树
Translate1: Pigs still need to climb trees

Pinyin1: dāng xiǎozhū zhèngyào cóng shùshàng xiàlai de shíhou ， tā kànjiàn lángláile
Chinese1: 当小猪正要从树上下来的时候，它看见狼来了
Translate1: When the pig was about to come down from the tree, it saw the wolf coming

Pinyin1: xiǎozhū xià le yīdàtiào

Pinyin1: láng zǒuguò láishuō

Chinese1: “小猪，你比我来得还早啊
Translate1: Pig, you have earlier than me

Pinyin1: shùshàng de píngguǒ hǎo ma ？ ”
Chinese1: 树上的苹果好吗？”
Translate1: Is the apple on the tree good?

Pinyin1: xiǎozhū shuōdao ： “ fēicháng hǎo ， wǒ gěi nǐ rēng yīgè píngguǒ ”

Translate1: The piglet said, "Very good, I'll throw you an apple

Pinyin1: yúshì ， xiǎozhū gùyì bǎ píngguǒ rēng dé hǎo yuǎn hǎo yuǎn
Chinese1: 于是，小猪故意把苹果扔得好远好远
Translate1: So, the piglet deliberately threw the apple far and far away.

Pinyin1: lángyào bǎ píngguǒ jiǎnhuílái ， tā dé pǎo hěncháng yīduànlù
Chinese1: 狼要把苹果捡回来，它得跑很长一段路

Pinyin1: xiǎozhū chènjī cóng shùshàng tiàoxiàlái

Pinyin1: gǎnjǐn pǎo huíjiā
Chinese1: 赶紧跑回家

Pinyin1: dìèrtiān ， láng yòu lái le

Pinyin1: láng shuō ： “ xiǎozhū ， jīntiānxiàwǔ shānxià yǒu jíshì ， nǐ xiǎng qù ma ？ ”
Chinese1: 狼说：“小猪，今天下午山下有集市，你想去吗？”
Translate1: The wolf said, "Pig, there is a market under the mountain this afternoon, do you want to go?

Pinyin1: xiǎozhū shuō ： “ en ， xiǎng qù ， nǐ jǐdiǎn láijiē wǒ ”
Chinese1: 小猪说：“嗯，想去，你几点来接我”
Translate1: The little pig said, "Well, want to go, what time do you pick me up?

Pinyin1: láng shuō ： “ sāndiǎnzhōng ”
Chinese1: 狼说：“三点钟”
Translate1: The wolf said: "Three o'clock

Pinyin1: xiǎozhū xiàng wǎngcháng yīyàng ， yòu tíqián chūfā le
Chinese1: 小猪像往常一样，又提前出发了
Translate1: Piglet, as usual, set off early again

Chinese1: 来到市场上，买了一桶黄油桶
Translate1: Come to the market, bought a bucket of butter barrels

Pinyin1: xiǎozhū zhèngyào huíjiā ， kànjiàn lángláile
Chinese1: 小猪正要回家，看见狼来了
Translate1: The piglet is going home and saw the wolf coming

Pinyin1: xiǎozhū zhè shì bù zhīdào yīnggāi zěnmebàn
Chinese1: 小猪这是不知道应该怎么办
Translate1: Little pig, this is not known what to do

Pinyin1: yúshì xiǎozhū jiù pá jìnhuáng yóutǒng lǐ ， cáng zài lǐbian
Chinese1: 于是小猪就爬进黄油桶里，藏在里边
Translate1: So the piglet crawled into the butter barrel, hidden in it

Pinyin1: dài zhe xiǎozhū cóng shānpō shàng gǔnxiàlái

Pinyin1: zhèshí ， bǎ láng gěi xià le yīdàtiào ， gǎnkuài pǎo huíjiā

Translate1: At this time, a big jump of the wolf, hurry up and go home

Chinese1: 狼根本就还没到市场
Translate1: The wolf has not yet arrived at the market

Pinyin1: hòulái ， lángqù xiǎozhū jiālǐ

Translate1: Later, the wolf went to the pig's house

Pinyin1: láng duì xiǎozhū shuōdao ： “ wǒ jīntiān zài qù shìchǎng de túzhōng
Chinese1: 狼对小猪说道：“我今天在去市场的途中
Translate1: The wolf said to the piglet: "I'm on the way to the market today

Pinyin1: yīgè yuányuánde huáng yóutǒng zài wǒ shēnhòu cóng shānshàng gǔn le xiàlai
Chinese1: 一个圆圆的黄油桶在我身后从山上滚了下来
Translate1: A round butter barrel rolled down from the mountain behind me

Pinyin1: bǎ wǒ xià le hǎo dà yī tiào
Chinese1: 把我吓了好大一跳
Translate1: I scared me a big jump

Pinyin1: xiǎozhū shuōdao ： “ ó ， nà shì wǒ ya
Chinese1: 小猪说道：“哦，那是我呀
Translate1: Little pig said, "Oh, that's me

Pinyin1: shì wǒ bǎ nǐ xià le yīdàtiào ，
Chinese1: 是我把你吓了一大跳，
Translate1: I was startled you a big jump,

Pinyin1: wǒ zài shìchǎng shàng mǎi le yīzhī huáng yóutǒng
Chinese1: 我在市场上买了一只黄油桶
Translate1: I bought a butter barrel in the market

Pinyin1: kànjiàn nǐ lái le ， wǒ jiù zuānjìn le tǒng lǐ
Chinese1: 看见你来了，我就钻进了桶里
Translate1: Seeing you coming, I got into the bucket

Pinyin1: ránhòu cóng shāndǐng shàng gǔn le xiàlai
Chinese1: 然后从山顶上滚了下来
Translate1: Then roll down from the top of the mountain

Pinyin1: láng tīng le ， fēicháng de shēngqì
Chinese1: 狼听了，非常的生气
Translate1: The wolf listened, very angry

Pinyin1: láng xīnli xiǎng ， yīdìng yào bǎ xiǎozhū chīdiào
Chinese1: 狼心里想，一定要把小猪吃掉
Translate1: The wolf thought to heart, be sure to eat the piglet

Pinyin1: láng jiùyào cóng yāntong zuānjìn xiǎozhū de wūzi
Chinese1: 狼就要从烟筒钻进小猪的屋子
Translate1: The wolf is going to enter the small pig's house from the cigarette tube

Pinyin1: ránhòu zhuāzhù xiǎozhū
Chinese1: 然后抓住小猪
Translate1: Then grab the piglet

Pinyin1: cōngming de xiǎozhū kànchū le láng de yīnmóu
Chinese1: 聪明的小猪看出了狼的阴谋
Translate1: The smart piglets saw the plot of the wolf

Pinyin1: zài lúzào shàngjià le yīkǒu dàguō
Chinese1: 在炉灶上架了一口大锅
Translate1: A large pot was put on the stove

Pinyin1: guōlǐ tiānmǎn le shuǐ ， xiàmiàn shēngzhe wàngwàng de huǒ
Chinese1: 锅里添满了水，下面生着旺旺的火
Translate1: The pot was full of water, and the fire was born below

Pinyin1: dāngláng cóng yāntong lǐ huáxiàlái de shíhou
Chinese1: 当狼从烟筒里滑下来的时候
Translate1: When the wolf slipped from the cigarette tube

Pinyin1: xiǎozhū jiēkāi le guōgài
Chinese1: 小猪揭开了锅盖
Translate1: Piggy unveiled the lid

Pinyin1: láng yītóu diào jìn le guōlǐ
Chinese1: 狼一头掉进了锅里
Translate1: The wolf fell into the pot with one end

Pinyin1: xiǎozhū yòu gǎnkuài gàishang guōgài
Chinese1: 小猪又赶快盖上锅盖
Translate1: Little pig quickly cover the pot

Pinyin1: ránhòu bǎ láng gěi zhǔshú le ， dàngzuò wánfàn chī
Chinese1: 然后把狼给煮熟了，当做完饭吃
Translate1: Then cook the wolf and eat it as a meal

Pinyin1: cóngcǐyǐhòu
Chinese1: 从此以后
Translate1: Since then

Pinyin1: xiǎozhū zàiyě bùshòu láng de gānrǎo
Chinese1: 小猪再也不受狼的干扰
Translate1: Piggy is no longer disturbed by the wolf

Pinyin1: xìngfú dì shēnghuó zhe
Chinese1: 幸福地生活着
Translate1: Live happily
